description: Fill in your landfill tax return form online

sections.title: About you
sections.description: Provide your information before telling us about your business

fields.label: Telephone number
fields.helpText: If this is a UK landline or an overseas number, you must include the area or dialling code.

fields.label: Position in the company
fields.helpText: For example: director, company, secretary, agent

sections.title: Business details
sections.description: This is your registered business address. We will ask you later about additional sites for this return.

fields.label: Return period start date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 01/10/2016.

fields.label: Return period end date
fields.helpText: This date is on the letter sent out notifying you that the return is due, for example 31/12/2016.

fields.label: Tax due for this period
fields.helpText: Do not include any bad debt relief or credits.

fields.label: Tax credit claimed in respect of contributions to environmental bodies
fields.helpText: The rules for claiming this tax credit are set out in the Landfill Tax Excise Notice LFT1.

fields.label: Bad debt relief claimed for landfill tax in this period
Other credits
fields.helpText: This is the amount of landfill tax credits you are claiming this period in respect of landfill tax paid waste, removed from site for environmental reasons or for reuse.

sections.title: Weight of waste per category, landfilled in this return period
sections.description: Where we have agreed a scheme to discount the water content of waste for tax calculation purposes, you should not include the weight of this water.

sections.title: Environment bodies
sections.description: List each environmental body contribution that you're claiming as tax credit. The sum of these contributions should equal the total tax credit claimed.
